pages.title: Jeweler
pages.text: This guy is all about precious stuff: silver, gold, gems, crystals... name it, he got it. He'll show rare stuff should you prove yourself to be trustworthy. As a specialist in vanity, he can be a valuable source of armor trims.

pages.name: Jeweler
pages.text: An unemployed villager can become a Jeweler when standing near a Market Table.
